text: Radyo Kahilwayan 106.7 (DYIS 106.7 MHz) is an FM station in the Philippines owned and operated by the Municipal Government of Santa Barbara. Its studios and transmitter are located at Merlo St., Santa Barbara, Iloilo. ==History== *2002 - Started as ISCOF Radio under Iloilo State College of Fisheries. *2016 - Partnered with Municipal Government of Santa Barbara & rebranded as Radyo Ugyon. *2008 - Fully acquired by Municipal Government of Santa Barbara & rebranded as Radyo Kahilwayan. ==References== ==External Links== *Radyo Kahilwayan FB Page Category:Radio stations in Iloilo Category:Radio stations established in 2002
title: DYIS
